list_definition.definition: to go on being, doing etc; to last or keep on

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He will continue in his present job
The noise continued for several hours

list_definition.definition: to go on (with) often after a break or pause

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He continued his talk after the interval
This story is continued on p.53.
